translations.chinese: 章邯已破項梁，以為楚地兵不足憂，乃渡河北擊趙王歇，大破之。
translations.english: Zhang Han had already defeated Xiang Liang and thought that the Chu region's troops were not worth worrying about, so he crossed north of the Yellow River to attack King Xie of Zhao, greatly defeating him.

translations.chinese: 歇保鉅鹿城，秦將王離圍之。
translations.english: Xie defended the city of Julu, where Qin general Wang Li besieged him.

translations.chinese: 趙數請救，懷王乃以宋義為上將，項羽為次將，范增為末將，北救趙。
translations.english: Zhao repeatedly requested rescue, so King Huai appointed Song Yi as supreme commander, Xiang Yu as deputy commander, and Fan Zeng as rear commander, to go north and rescue Zhao.

translations.chinese: 初，懷王與諸將約，先入定關中者王之。
translations.english: Initially, King Huai had made an agreement with the generals that whoever first entered and pacified Guanzhong would be made king of it.

translations.chinese: 當是時，秦兵彊，常乘勝逐北，諸將莫利先入關。
translations.english: At this time, Qin troops were strong and often took advantage of victories to pursue defeated enemies. None of the generals saw benefit in being the first to enter the pass.
